comment_overall:
Devaki demonstrated strong technical foundations and exceptional problem-solving abilities throughout her engagement. She is highly skilled in data analytics, dashboard development, and full-stack application design. Her ability to understand business needs and convert them into clean, functional solutions stands out.
She has shown excellent ownership, attention to detail, and the capability to independently build complex systems like the DataNexus dashboard. I strongly believe she is job-ready and can make immediate contributions in analytics, AI, or software development roles.
technologies: Strengths: React, Vite, TailwindCSS, Express.js, Node.js, JWT auth, MySQL, Power BI, Python, Data Modeling, APIs Areas for further enhancement: Cloud deployment (AWS/GCP), CI/CD pipelines, advanced ML model deployment
